headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for tado° - Smart AC Control

device_code.title: Device Code
device_code.description: The unique `device code` for your device

occupancySensorsEnabled.title: Occupancy Sensors
occupancySensorsEnabled.description: Show occupancy sensors for each tado° user connected to your home

occupancyPollingInterval.title: Occupancy Status Polling Interval in Seconds
occupancyPollingInterval.description: Time in seconds between each status polling of the occupancy sensors

anyoneSensor.title: Anyone Occupancy Sensor
anyoneSensor.description: Adds 1 Occupancy Sensor named "Anyone" to represent the state of someone at home

weatherSensorsEnabled.title: Weather Sensor
weatherSensorsEnabled.description: Show weather sensor with outside temperature and solar intensity

weatherPollingInterval.title: Weather Status Polling Interval in Minutes
weatherPollingInterval.description: Time in minutes between each status polling of the weather information

homeID.title: Home ID
homeID.description: If supplied, the plugin will use the attached one and not try to retrieve it

oneOf.title: MANUAL: Manual control until ended by the user
TADO_MODE: Manual control until next schedule change
TIMER: Manual control until timer ends

durationInMinutes.title: Timer Duration in Minutes
durationInMinutes.description: Duration in minutes for the "TIMER" settings

disableFan.title: Disable Fan Accessory
disableFan.description: Disable FAN mode control - remove extra fan accessory

disableDry.title: Disable Dry Accessory
disableDry.description: Disable DRY mode control - remove extra dehumidifier accessory

manualControlSwitch.title: Enable Manual Control Switch
manualControlSwitch.description: Adding a switch to set or remove manual control

historyStorage.title: Enable History Storage
historyStorage.description: Records all temperature & humidity measurements history to be viewable in the Eve app

extraHumiditySensor.title: Enable External Humidity Sensor
extraHumiditySensor.description: Creates an external sensor outside of the accessory that shows relative humidity

forceThermostat.title: Force Thermostat Accessory
forceThermostat.description: When enabled, it will force Homebridge to create Thermostat accessory instead of the default HeaterCooler(AC)

forceHeaterCooler.title: Force HeaterCooler(AC) Accessory
forceHeaterCooler.description: When enabled, it will force Homebridge to create HeaterCooler(AC) accessory instead of Thermostat, even when Thermostatic mode is enabled

disableAcAccessory.title: Disable AC Accessory
disableAcAccessory.description: When enabled, it will ignore the main AC devices and will only show occupancy sensors & weather sensors

statePollingInterval.title: AC Device Status Polling Interval in Seconds
statePollingInterval.description: Time in seconds between each status polling of the tado devices (set to 0 for no polling)

debug.title: Enable Debug Logs
debug.description: When checked, the plugin will produce extra logs for debugging purposes

layout.title: Authorize Tado
layout.description: Create the `authorize` request, still needs to be manually approved

layout.title: Advanced Settings
layout.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
